library(dplyr)

my_function<-function(x,reps =2) {
  for (i in 1:reps){
    print(x)
  }
  for(i in 1:nrow(x)){
    print(x[i,])
  }
  return(NULL)
}

df<-data.frame(rowid= 1:15, value=c("a","b","c","d","e"))

my_function(df)

new_df<-my_function(df)

new_df

new1_function<- function(x, condition){
  library(tidyverse)
  x<-x%>% filter(value%in% condition)
  return(x)
}

new1_function(df)
new1_function(df, condition=c("c","e"))
              
              

new_function<- function(x, condition, variable){
  library(tidyverse)
  x<-x%>% filter(value%in% condition)
  return(x)
}

new_function(df, condition=c("c","e"), variable="value")

newer_df<- new_function(df, condition=c("c","e"), variable="value")

newer_df
